# UIImageRespectsSafeAreaInsets

**Property List Key**

A Boolean that specifies whether the launch image should respect the safe area insets.

## Main Interface

- **UIColorName**: The name of a color to use as the background color on the launch screen.
- **UIImageName**: The name of an image to display during app launch.
